concentration_bad: 🧠 Concentration wasn't very high. It is recommended to take small breaks to re-energize ☕

questions_good: 🙋‍♀️ Participants asked a lot of questions 🎓

concentration_good: 🧠 Participants were very focused, that is a great sign of efficient learning 📚
